      • login

        public org.json.JSONObject login(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Calls login on the server
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        JSONObject containing name, password, and ID
        Pre-Conditions
        username and password are not null
        Post-Conditions
        receives the http response and sets the user cookie.

      • register

        public org.json.JSONObject register(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)
        Calls register on the server
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        JSONObject containing name,password, and ID used to set user.cookie
        Pre-Conditions
        username and password are not null and the username isn't already in use.
        Post-Conditions
        new user account is created, receive a http response, set the user cookie

      • gamesList

        public org.json.JSONObject gamesList()
        Calls games/list on the server
        Returns:
        a JSON array containing a list of objects containing information about the server's games.
        Post-Conditions
        got a list of games from the server

      • createGame

        public org.json.JSONObject createGame(java.lang.String name,
                             boolean randomTiles,
                             boolean randomNumbers,
                             boolean randomPorts)
        Parameters:
        name -
        randomTiles -
        randomNumbers -
        randomPorts -
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing all of the information for the game board including game name, game id and an array for four empty player objects.
        Pre-Conditions
        name is not null, has values for randomTiles, randomNumbers, and randomPorts.
        Post-Conditions
        receive a HTTP response for success or failure

      • joinGame

        public org.json.JSONObject joinGame(int ID,
                           java.lang.String color)
        Parameters:
        ID -
        color -
        Returns:
        Pre-Conditions
        the user is logged in, the player is already in the specified game or the game has space for an extra player, the ID is valid, and the color is valid
        Post-Conditions
        the player is added to the game with the desired color,
